name: Caveman Capers
overview: Caveman Capers was originally published by Icon, with a reissue by Alternative Software under the title Caveman!. In this scrolling game you play as Ogg the caveman who travels on the back of Kickstart the turtle. You must avoid holes, snakes and toadstools, as well as prehistoric enemies such as pterodactyls and dinosaurs. The game has sixty levels.
